title: Starter Deck Rework
description:
Adds 13 new starting cards that you can choose from when starting a run - 3 for each character and a bonus 1 for Ironclad. Also changes how Strikes and Defends upgrade so they fit into their character's gimmicks more.

[hr][/hr]

[b]Changes[/b]
[list]
[*]Adds 3 new starting cards for each character (4 for Ironclad)
[*]Strikes and Defends have a unique upgrade that fit each character's gimmicks.
[*]Ironclad has 1 Strike removed.
[*]The Silent has 1 Strike and 1 Defend removed to make her 4/4/1/1.
[/list]

Everything is configurable.

[hr][/hr]

Source code: https://github.com/stormytuna/StarterDeckRework

If you are able to contribute translations, it would be much appreciated!

If you enjoy my work, [url=https://ko-fi.com/stormytuna]please consider donating[/url]
changeNote:
v2.0.2

- Fix crashes for custom characters
